articles.description: The Joe Exotic phenomenon keeps growing, with Nicolas Cage to star in a TV miniseries about the colorful wild animal owner made famous by the "Tiger King" docuseries.

articles.title: Maul's Overconfidence is his Nearly Fatal Flaw in 'Star Wars: The Clone Wars,' According to Dave Filoni - Showbiz Cheat Sheet
articles.description: Maul is the character that keeps on coming back, even when it looks like his time his up. He's also one of the most complex 'Star Wars' characters.
articles.content: One of the funniest lines Obi-Wan Kenobi said this season had to do with his longtime nemesis, Maul: I killed Maul once. Best to capture him; he doesnt seem to stay dead. While funny, it is also entirely true. Maul is not only a fighter but a survivor, lastin… [+4152 chars]

articles.title: Author Wins Pulitzers With 2 Consecutive Books - Newser
articles.description: Colson Whitehead takes the fiction prize again
articles.content:
